imdb.plot outline: After the irritating doubt from other Spartans, Blu takes on an adventure on his own to find someone named "Momma". Could Blu be referring his mother as "Momma" or could "Momma" be a totally different person... What could we find out in this outrageous show? MOMMA: A Very Vexatious Story.
imdb.title: MOMMA: A Very Vexatious Story
akas: MOMMA: A Very Vexatious Story (United States)
plot: After the irritating doubt from other Spartans, Blu takes on an adventure on his own to find someone named "Momma". Could Blu be referring his mother as "Momma" or could "Momma" be a totally different person... What could we find out in this outrageous show? _MOMMA: A Very Vexatious Story_ (qv).::Haiden Charles
